text: Moradabad Institute Of Technology () is an educational institution in Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh, India. It was established in the year 1996 by Moradabad Educational Trust under the Self Financing Scheme of the Government of India. The Campus extends to an area of at the banks of Ram Ganga river. It is located five km from the Moradabad railway station. ==Academics== Admissions to the undergraduate course is done through the UPSEE. The institute offers 6 Undergraduate programs in Engineering of four-year duration. ==Social Networking Connections== A few generous alumni of MIT have created online communities to gather all the past present students of MIT so that they all can interact in real time. A Facebook page has been generated for all the MITians.http://www.facebook.com/pages/Moradabad-India/Moradabad- Institute-of-Technology/139081186104005 ==Co-curricular activities== There is a technical fest called "Hi-Tech" in every even semester followed by a cultural night called "Utkarsh". ==Undergraduate Engineering Programs== B.Tech. In: Computer Science & Engg. Electronics & Communication Engg. Electrical & Electronics Engg. Mechanical Engg. Electrical Engg. Civil Engg. Architecture The university commenced its first batch in B.Arch. from 14 August 09. The batch strength is 40 students. ==Post Graduate Management Programs== M.B.A. ==References== Category:Education in Moradabad Category:Engineering colleges in Uttar Pradesh Category:Uttar Pradesh Technical University Category:Educational institutions established in 1996 Category:1996 establishments in India Category:Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University
title: Moradabad Institute of Technology
